sink.preCopyScript:
select * into usda.TempDairy from USDA.workdairyprod
	delete from usda.TempDairy where commodityid in (6,8) and catid = 41
truncate table usda.workDairyProd

activities.name: Cold Storage Transformations
activities.description: Executes 4 procedures to deal with all dairy calculations and queries

sink.preCopyScript:
update usda.usdadatafactory set weekending = cast(weekendingstring as date)
	where weekending <> ''
	update usda.usdadatafactory set value = replace(value,',','')
	update USDA.USDADataFactory set value = NULL where isnumeric(value) = 0
	update usda.usdadatafactory set valuedec = cast(value as decimal(18,0))
	update usda.usdadatafactory set stateansiint = cast(stateansi as int)

truncate table usda.usdadata

properties.description: Milk Prod , Cow Inv, Pord Per Cow

sink.preCopyScript:
update usda.usdadatafactory set weekending = cast(weekendingstring as date)
	where weekendingstring <> ''and weekendingstring is not null
	update usda.usdadatafactory set value = replace(value,',','')
	update USDA.USDADataFactory set value = NULL where isnumeric(value) = 0
	update usda.usdadatafactory set valuedec = cast(value as decimal(18,0))
	update usda.usdadatafactory set stateansiint = cast(stateansi as int)


	truncate table USDA.USDAData
